message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to sell it to you at this price, but I'm not sure if you'll be willing to pay it. I'm hoping you'll take a chance on this amazing opportunity.
I'm not convinced yet, I'd like to wait and see what other products you have.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this product is indeed of the highest quality. I'm willing to sweeten the deal by offering you a 10% discount, bringing the price down to $9000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long this product will be available at this price.
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still hesitant. I'd like to wait and see what other products you have.

I understand your caution, but I want to give you a more concrete reason to trust this product. I'm willing to offer you a 90-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with the product, I'll give you a full refund. This way, you can try it out with minimal risk. The price remains at $9000.
The guarantee is a good offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I've noticed you're interested in seeing more products, so I'll give you a sneak peek at the overall quality distribution of the products I have available. Out of the 20 products, I can tell you that 16 of them are high-quality, and 4 are low-quality. This product I'm offering you now is one of the high-quality ones. The price remains at $9000, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
With this information, I'm more confident in the quality of the product. I'll take the chance and buy it.
